execute:

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(janitor)

mus_initial_data <- read_delim(
  "./data.csv",
  delim="/",
  show_col_types = FALSE
)|>
clean_names()

mus_clean_data <- mus_initial_data|>
  mutate(
    vid_uploaddate = as.Date(vid_uploaddate),
  )|>
  filter(
     as.numeric(format(vid_uploaddate, "%Y")) > 2020       # remove videos from before furnace
  )|>
  arrange(vid_uploaddate)|>                                # arrange by upload date
  mutate(n = row_number())

#print(mus_clean_data)

mus_clean_data|>ggplot(
  aes(
    x = vid_uploaddate,
    y = n
  )
)+
geom_point(
  alpha = .4,
  size = .1
)+
scale_x_date()



```
